options.description: Union Station, Toronto's main transit hub, is located just a short walk from Scotiabank Arena, providing access via TTC subway, GO Transit, and VIA Rail.
The TTC also operates streetcar lines that run close to Scotiabank Arena, offering convenient access from various parts of the city.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Weekday games may offer more affordable ticket prices compared to weekend games. Consider looking for last-minute deals or group discounts for additional savings.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always purchase tickets from reputable sources to avoid counterfeit tickets. Use verified secondary marketplaces with buyer protections to ensure ticket authenticity. Be cautious of buying tickets from resellers outside the venue.
